results.idea: Short-term momentum: 1-month active return quantile
results.description: Used high-coverage, high-use price momentum field (mdl177_fa_actrtn1m, coverage=1.0, userCount=0). Applied SUGGESTION1 by selecting a strong single price datafield (few variables to keep implementation short per KEEP_IN_MIND). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector). Coverage high so ts_backfill not needed (SUGGESTION3). Preference for high user/alphaCount fields per SUGGESTION4—field has broad usage in dataset. Confidence set to 0.78 because 1-month momentum is a common short-term predictor but mean-reverts sometimes.

results.idea: Medium-term momentum: 6-month active return z-score
results.description: Used mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn6m (coverage=1.0, userCount=15). SUGGESTION1: focused on price momentum; kept single high-quality field to limit operators (KEEP_IN_MIND2). No vector usage (SUGGESTION2). Coverage high => no ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). High user/alphaCount supports signal (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.80: proven medium-term momentum effect.

results.idea: Momentum crossover: 50/200 MA ratio rank
results.description: Combined short vs long trend using mdl177_2_globaldevnorthamerica_v502_p50_200ratio (coverage 0.5973). SUGGESTION1: used single trend field to keep implementation compact per KEEP_IN_MIND. Coverage slightly below 0.6 -> applied ts_backfill(30) to backfill recent missing values (SUGGESTION3). No vector fields (SUGGESTION2). Field moderate coverage so confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Mean reversion: 1-month price reversal (negative 1-month return)
results.description: Used short-term active return mdl177_fa_actrtn1m (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION1: selected price return field; kept implementation short (KEEP_IN_MIND). No ts_backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: field widely used. Confidence 0.67 since short-term reversal is common but weaker than momentum.

results.idea: Industry-relative 4-week return momentum
results.description: Used industry-relative 4-week return mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_indrelrtn4w_ (coverage=0.9677, userCount=16). SUGGESTION1: chose industry-relative to reduce industry bias. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field only. No backfill required. SUGGESTION4: decent usage. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Liquidity-adjusted momentum: visibility ratio * 2-month return
results.description: Combined volume/activity (mdl77_400_visiratio, coverage=0.9712, userCount=123) with 2-month active return (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn2m, coverage=0.9974). SUGGESTION1: used two complementary datafields (volume + price) to improve signal. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Both fields high coverage => no ts_backfill. Kept operators <=7 (KEEP_IN_MIND2). Confidence 0.82 because combining volume confirms momentum.

results.idea: Volatility squeeze: low 24-month VaR (safety) with momentum
results.description: Used mdl177_pricemomentumfactor_var24m (coverage=0.9386) and 6-month return mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn6m. SUGGESTION1: two fields to select stocks with favorable risk/momentum tradeoff. No ts_backfill needed. Operators kept minimal (<=7). Confidence 0.7 because low downside risk + momentum is moderately predictive.
